=========
CalendarX
=========

This is a port of CalendarX to Plone 3 based on on the last Plone 2 stable
release - version 0.6.6. Our first effort has been to move to an Archetypes
based schema by migrating most of the property sheets to AT schemata. And it
works.

see /docs/HISTORY.txt for up to date changes by lupa, and by others if they've
added themselves.
